subject: Main method not getting called when running through Ant.
msgSnippet: Hello All, I am new to JUnit. This is my first post. I am passing parameters to my main method that sets values (host name, port etc.) for my tests to run
messageBody:
Hello All,

I am new to JUnit. This is my first post.

I am passing parameters to my main method that sets values (host
name, port etc.) for my tests to run correctly. After setting the
parameters I call: junit.textui.TestRunner.run( suite());
where suite is a function as:

public static Test suite()
{
TestSuite retval = new TestSuite();
retval.addTest(new LoginTest("testValidLoginTest"));
retval.addTest(new LoginTest("testInValidLoginTest"));
}

I am building and running my tests through Ant:
<target name="test" depends="compile">
<junit printsummary="yes" haltonerror="yes" haltonfailure="yes"
fork="yes">
<formatter type="plain" usefile="false"/>
<test name="oracle.security.sso.test.LoginTest"/>
<classpath>

<fileset dir="${java.dir}">
<include name="src.zip"/>
....
</classpath>
</junit>

Through command line my main method gets called but it does not get
called through ant.
Now it doesn't even enter main and does not even go to
junit.textui.TestRunner.run( suite());

How do I force it to call main since I need my parameters to be set.

Please help.

Thanks,
Sunil
